sub_title: Marine System Engineer - SBM Offshore Schiedam B.V.
summary: HOEMIN CHUNG is an experienced Process & Marine System Engineer, specialized in FPSO and FLNG Marine systems with more than 16 YEARS of relevant experience. He has involved in various FPSO, FLNG FEED and Technical Development Projects and he is a licensed professional engineer in Chemical discipline. (P.E. Chemical, OSBEELS, 91582PE), and Functional Safety Engineer in Safety Instrumented Systems (TUV Rheinland, #17230/18). He is currently acting as a Senior Export, a member of Expert Family in SBM Offshore in LNG, Cargo, Marine Utilities and Boiler Systems.
